Module com.github.niipi.ohii_harjoitustyo
Package com.github.niipi.ohii_harjoitustyo

Class Houseplant

java.lang.Object
com.github.niipi.ohii_harjoitustyo.Houseplant
All Implemented Interfaces:
WateringNeeds, Serializable
public class Houseplant extends Object implements Serializable, WateringNeeds
Class for creating individual houseplant objects. Includes three fields: name, litresOfWater and daysBetweenWatering. Preliminary methods waterPerWeek and waterPer28Days are included for future needs of watering schedule optimization.
Author:
Niina Piiroinen

    • waterPerWeek

      public double waterPerWeek()
      Calculates average amount of water in a week for the houseplant. Used to find the closest match between different houseplant objects and their weekly watering needs.
      Specified by:
